attributes.action: Boris Johnson must resign now that prorogation of parliament ruled unlawful
attributes.background: On the 28th August 2019, Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced his intention to prorogue parliament. On the 24th September, the Supreme Court found that this action was illegal. This petition proposes that his actions constituted an attack on British democracy and that he must resign forthwith.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for someone to lose their job.
